de.thkoeln.bibl.api.media

Class SisisMedia<T extends AbstractMediaNumber>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.media.LibraryMedia<T>
      • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.media.SisisMedia<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of media number the sisis media used
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<LibraryMedia<T>>

    public class SisisMedia<T extends AbstractMediaNumber>
extends LibraryMedia<T>
    Class extends the structure of a library media by the SISIS-SunRise specific data. This class supports the serializing to/from XML data.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SisisMedia.BorrowState
      The BorrowState describes the borrow status of the SISIS media.
      static class  SisisMedia.LoanAbility
      The LoanAbility describes the loanable status of the SISIS media.

        public void setCreated(java.lang.String date)
